item.title: Red add a quote by Katie Crouch
item.description: "Without a bellyful of liquor, all I am is a woman who cracks stupid jokes to make up for being shy." -- Katie Crouch

item.title: Red add a quote by Joe Meno
item.description: "It is the strain of walking around the world-down the street, riding city buses and elevators, moving from place to place to place-and not knowing who might want to destroy you, who might like to fill your heart with poison, who might rob you and stab you, who might stand above you in the dark with a tarantula." -- Joe Meno

item.title: Red add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "I am so clever that sometimes I don't understand a single word of what I am saying." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Red add a quote by Neil Gaiman
item.description: "Life is a disease: sexually transmitted, and invariably fatal." -- Neil Gaiman

item.title: Red add a quote by John Kennedy Toole
item.description: "I am at the moment writing a lengthy indictment against our century. When my brain begins to reel from my literary labors, I make an occasional cheese dip." -- John Kennedy Toole

item.title: Red add a quote by John Kennedy Toole
item.description: "My life is a rather grim one. One day I shall perhaps describe it to you in great detail." -- John Kennedy Toole

item.title: Red add a quote by John Kennedy Toole
item.description: "you can always tell employees of the government by the total vacancy which occupies the space where most other people have faces." -- John Kennedy Toole

item.title: Red add a quote by John Kennedy Toole
item.description: "Veneration of Mark Twain is one of the roots of our current intellectual stalemate." -- John Kennedy Toole

item.title: Red add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "It is hard enough to remember my opinions, without also remembering my reasons for them!" -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Red add a quote by Malcolm X
item.description: "You're not to be so blind with patriotism that you can't face reality. Wrong is wrong, no matter who does it or says it." -- Malcolm X

item.title: Red add a quote by Rupaul
item.description: "my goal is to always come from a place of love ...but sometimes you just have to break it down for a motherfucker" -- Rupaul
